purpleculture_pinyin:
kāng
generous; magnanimous
щедрый; великодушный
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 康 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
慷慨 [ kāng kǎi ]: vehement; fervent; generous; giving; liberal
慷慨激昂 [ kāng kǎi jī áng ]: impassioned; vehement
慷慨解囊 [ kāng kǎi jiě náng ]: to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money; to give generously to charity
慷慨陈词 [ kāng kǎi chén cí ]: to present one's views vehemently (idiom)
慷慨就义 [ kāng kǎi jiù yì ]: to die a hero's death (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 康 [ kāng ] health; peace, quiet
heisig_chinese_memo: When your body is hale it affects your state of mind and makes your more generous and giving. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese: kāng: (графема) щедрый, великодушный (не используется в одиночку)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When your body is hale it affects your state of mind and makes your more generous and giving. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " heart " and " kang ", it is often used in conjunction with " sigh " to express emotional excitement. Cao Cao of the Three Kingdoms "Dan Ge Xing": "Be generous with generosity, and worry and thought will be unforgettable."

" Generosity " can mean a bold personality. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-The Legend of King Qi Wu": "Sexually resolute, generous and generous."

" Generosity " also expressed exclamation. "Ji Yun‧ Tang Yun": "Generosity, generosity, sigh." "Nineteen Ancient Poems-There are Tall Buildings in the Northwest": "Sigh again and again, generosity is more than sorrow."

" Generous " also said that generous, not stingy. "Water Margin" Chapter 5: "Lu Zhishen saw that Li Zhong and Zhou Tong were not generous people. They were stingy and just went down the mountain."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " heart " and " kang ", it is often used in conjunction with " sigh " to express emotional excitement.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「康」聲，常與「慨」連用，表示情緒激昂。三國魏曹操〈短歌行〉：「慨當以慷，憂思難忘。」

　　「慷」可表示性格豪爽。《後漢書‧齊武王縯傳》：「性剛毅，慷慨有大節。」

　　「慷」也表示感嘆。《集韻‧唐韻》：「慷，慷慨，嘆也。」《古詩十九首‧西北有高樓》：「一彈再三歎，慷慨有餘哀。」

　　「慷」亦表示大方、不吝嗇。《水滸傳》第5回：「魯智深見李忠、周通不是個慷慨之人，作事慳吝，只要下山。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「康」聲，常與「慨」連用，表示情緒激昂。

Chinese: When your body is hale it affects your state of mind and makes your more generous and giving.  
Meaning: generous
Story: When your body is hale it affects your state of mind and makes your more generous and giving.  
Kind: both
從「 心 」，「 康 」聲，常與「 慨 」連用，表示情緒激昂。三國魏曹操〈短歌行〉：「慨當以慷，憂思難忘。」 「 慷 」可表示性格豪爽。《後漢書‧齊武王縯傳》：「性剛毅，慷慨有大節。」 「 慷 」也表示感嘆。《集韻‧唐韻》：「慷，慷慨，嘆也。」《古詩十九首‧西北有高樓》：「一彈再三歎，慷慨有餘哀。」 「 慷 」亦表示大方、不吝嗇。《水滸傳》第5回：「魯智深見李忠、周通不是個慷慨之人，作事慳吝，只要下山。」
From the sound of " heart" and " kang", it is often used in conjunction with " sigh" to express emotional excitement. Cao Cao of the Three Kingdoms "Dan Ge Xing": "Be generous with generosity, and worry and thought will be unforgettable." " Generosity" can mean a bold personality. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-The Legend of King Qi Wu": "Sexually resolute, generous and generous." " Generosity" also expressed exclamation. "Ji Yun‧ Tang Yun": "Generosity, generosity, sigh." "Nineteen Ancient Poems-There are Tall Buildings in the Northwest": "Sigh again and again, generosity is more than sorrow." " Generous" also said that generous, not stingy. "Water Margin" Chapter 5: "Lu Zhishen saw that Li Zhong and Zhou Tong were not generous people. They were stingy and just went down the mountain."

慷字的基本解释

慷
kāng
〔慷慨〕ａ．情绪激昂，如“慷慷激昂”；ｂ．待人热诚，愿意用财物帮助人，如“为人慷慷大方”。

慷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kāng］
［《廣韻》苦朗切，上蕩，溪。］
［《集韻》丘岡切，平唐，溪。］
亦作“忼1”。
(1)意气激昂。
(2)性格豪爽。参见“慷慨”。
(3)感叹。参见“慷慨”、“慷喟”。
(4)大方。

慷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慷； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页400第16
【廣韻】【韻會】苦朗切【集韻】口朗切【正韻】口黨切，?與忼同。慷慨，激昂之意。【後漢·齊武王縯傳】性剛毅慷慨。　又【五音集韻】胡朗切，音沆。又去聲。【正韻】口浪切，音亢。義?同。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?丘岡切，音康。【曹操·短歌行】慨當以慷。【成公綏·嘯賦】時幽散而將絕，中矯厲而慨慷。徐婉約而優游，紛繁騖而激揚。

慷字的源字形

慷字的起名意思

：本义是情绪激昂意，也可表示人大方、热诚、大度。比如起名用字慷乐、慷睿、慷坤。

generous
Basic explanation of words
generous
kāng
[Generosity] a. Passionate emotions, such as "improvement"; b. Treat people with enthusiasm and willingness to use money to help people, such as "be generous and generous."

[①]［kāng］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, upswing, creek. ]
["Jiyun" Qiu Gangqie, Pingtang, Xi. ]
Also known as "忼1".
(1) Excited.
(2) Outstanding character. See "generosity".
(3) Exclamation. See also "generous", "generous".
(4) Generous.

[The Legend of King Qi Wu of the Later Han Dynasty] Resolute and generous.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Hu Langqie, Yinhang. Go again. [Positive rhyme] The mouth is cut and the tone is strong. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Qiu Gangqie, Yinkang. [Cao Cao·Dan Ge Xing] Be generous. [Chenggongsui·Xiaofu] The time is secluded and extinct, in the midst of fierceness and generosity. generous
Source glyph
generous
Name meaning
: The original meaning is passionate, but it can also mean that people are generous, enthusiastic, and generous. Such as naming the words Kangle, Kangrui, and Kangkun.
形声字。本写作忧,从心(↑),篆书形体像心脏,表示和品性有关;亢(kang )声,亢有高义,表示情绪高昂。隶、楷书从
↑(心)、康(kang)声,康有褒扬、光大义,表示慷慨既值得褒
扬、光大。本义是慷慨。
[慷慨]①充满正气;情绪激昂:~激昂|~陈词。②大
方;不吝惜:一解囊。
~慨 ~慨陈词 ~慨激昂 ~慨解囊 ~概就义
慷
kāng
阶慷慷
篆
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Письмо - это беспокойство, от сердца (↑), сценарий печати подобен сердцу, что означает, что он связан с персонажем; звук кан (канг), кан имеет высокое значение, выражает высокие эмоции.
Ли, обычный сценарий от ↑ (сердце), Кан (кан) звук, Кан имеет похвалу и великую праведность, выражение щедрости достойно похвалы и величия.
Первоначальное значение - щедрость.
[Щедрый] ①Полный праведник, страстный: ~ возбужденное | ~ выражение лица.
② Щедрый; не сомневайтесь: сумка.
~ 實 ~ 報 話 ~ 報 生 ~ 個個 包 ~ 簡 專 理
